Is it like a 720p?

Note to downloaders. Although the image would give the impression this is an HD disc rip, it is actually from a TV source, with the ABC logo displayed in the bottom right corner throughout, a TV14 box in the upper left-hand corner after every commercial break, and some slight edits for television, mostly in the dialogue.  With that in mind, it is a very high quality rip of a great movie.
